positions.description: •	Application integration between CRM and telecom provisioning systems

•	Anomaly detection from log files. Predict performance and failure symptoms of cloud databases and clusters.
•	Deployed in Public and Hybrid cloud environments.
•	Lead a 3 member AI/ML research team for building ML models for automating process control in manufacturing systems
•	Rule learning algorithms to detect fraudulent transactions

•	One of the first AI/ML Engineers at DataFlow
•	Built the AI/ML practice that trained and deployed models as microservices in the cloud to
         •	Monitor data systems
         •	Detect anomalies in data pipelines
         •	Help with load simulations for planning
         •	Make recommendations for optimization
         •	Provide a Chat interface using LLM to help with technical support

data.summary:
— Programming: C/C++, Python, Spark, Scala, JAVA , Shell Script, MATLAB, R, perl
— Strong in data structures, algorithms and data mining
— Machine Learning/Deep Learning skills: CNN, logistic regression, decision tree, random forest, clustering
     (Kmeans, Kmedian and GMM), NLP, Knowledge Graph, ranking and recommendation, XGBoost, SVM, RNN (LSTM, Attention Model), GAN, VAE, YOLO algorithm
— Familiar with MapReduce and parallel programming
— Experience using machine learning and deep learning frameworks and libraries, including Tensorflow, Keras, Horovod, OpenVINO, Caffe, MXNet, Scikit-Learn
— Familiar with optimization algorithm, pattern recognition, image processing/computer vision techniques, such as edge detection, image segmentation, image smoothing and filter design
— Experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQLite, Cassandra
— Experience with large-scale and high efficient software development
— Four years Object Oriented design and development experience

positions.description:
•	Software development for computational systems with a focus on optimization techniques using C++.
•	Built convolutional neural network (CNN) model-based defect detection classifier, achieved 99% accuracy and 20X speed up compared with traditional techniques
•	Developed computational geometry algorithm and polygon handling engine
•	Design and optimize infrastructural search/query engine for geometric layout database
•	Work with other engineers to effectively align and simplify APIs based on user requirements

•	Developed machine learning algorithm (supervised learning) to solve complex optimization problems
•	Designed frequency-dependent filter to improve signal processing
•	Developed python scripts flow for data mining in large datasets

machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, pattern recognition and image processing

➢ Machine learning for pattern recognition.
➢ Deep learning network architect(GAN, ResNet, DenseNet, InceptionNet) for image/domain transformation, feature extraction, detection, and classification.

Team: Advanced Algorithms
Machine Learning algorithm to solve complex optimization problems

data.summary: I am a senior software engineer in the Statistics and Machine learning team at MathWorks. I develop machine learning features in the areas of Machine learning pipelines, Automated Machine Learning and Hyper-parameter optimization.

positions.description:
Member of platform software development team, developing applications in C++.
Experienced in working in a full life cycle project, deriving requirements, developing software, writing unit tests etc.

Develop and improve machine learning software developing new features, enhancing the existing features.
Integrating features with existing machine learning software in the areas of AutoML and Hyperparameter optimization.
Responsible for owning and shipping complete software features. Developing requirements through customer interviews and usability tests, developing appropriate architecture and implementing designs and performing unit tests.
I am responsible for the full life cycle development of multiple machine learning features in the areas of Machine learning pipelines, AutoML and Hyperparameter tuning using Bayesian optimization.

Developed Edit Time Checks to identify errors made by users when they are developing state flow models 
Worked towards reducing the memory utilization of the Simulink while editing models with more than 10000 blocks

Contributing to software development by adding new features to the machine learning toolbox in MATLAB 
Providing application support to MathWorks customers for highly complex technical issues in MATLAB

currentPosition.description: I am responsible for the full life cycle development of multiple machine learning features in the areas of Machine learning pipelines, AutoML and Hyperparameter tuning using Bayesian optimization.
